mainboard.name: Scalding Tarn
mainboard.oracle_text: {T}, Pay 1 life, Sacrifice Scalding Tarn: Search your library for an Island or Mountain card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

mainboard.name: Spell Pierce
mainboard.oracle_text: Counter target noncreature spell unless its controller pays {2}.

mainboard.name: Chandra, Hope's Beacon
mainboard.oracle_text:
Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, copy it. You may choose new targets for the copy. This ability triggers only once each turn.
+2: Add two mana in any combination of colors.
+1: Exile the top five cards of your library. Until the end of your next turn, you may cast an instant or sorcery spell from among those exiled cards.
−X: Chandra, Hope's Beacon deals X damage to each of up to two targets.

mainboard.name: Saheeli, Sublime Artificer
mainboard.oracle_text:
Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, create a 1/1 colorless Servo artifact creature token.
−2: Target artifact you control becomes a copy of another target artifact or creature you control until end of turn, except it's an artifact in addition to its other types.

mainboard.name: Emergence Zone
mainboard.oracle_text:
{T}: Add {C}.
{1}, {T}, Sacrifice Emergence Zone: You may cast spells this turn as though they had flash.

mainboard.name: Quicken
mainboard.oracle_text:
The next sorcery spell you cast this turn can be cast as though it had flash. (It can be cast any time you could cast an instant.)
Draw a card.

mainboard.name: Jace, Arcane Strategist
mainboard.oracle_text:
Whenever you draw your second card each turn, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control.
+1: Draw a card.
−7: Creatures you control can't be blocked this turn.

mainboard.name: Steam Vents
mainboard.oracle_text:
({T}: Add {U} or {R}.)
As Steam Vents enters the battlefield, you may pay 2 life. If you don't, it enters the battlefield tapped.

mainboard.name: Unsummon
mainboard.oracle_text: Return target creature to its owner's hand.

mainboard.name: Comet Storm
mainboard.oracle_text:
Multikicker {1} (You may pay an additional {1} any number of times as you cast this spell.)
Choose any target, then choose another target for each time this spell was kicked. Comet Storm deals X damage to each of them.

mainboard.name: Brineborn Cutthroat
mainboard.oracle_text:
Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.)
Whenever you cast a spell during an opponent's turn, put a +1/+1 counter on Brineborn Cutthroat.

mainboard.name: Arcbound Tracker
mainboard.oracle_text:
Menace
Modular 2 (This creature enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it. When it dies, you may put its +1/+1 counters on target artifact creature.)
Whenever you cast a spell other than your first spell each turn, put a +1/+1 counter on Arcbound Tracker.

mainboard.name: Empty the Warrens
mainboard.oracle_text:
Create two 1/1 red Goblin creature tokens.
Storm (When you cast this spell, copy it for each spell cast before it this turn.)

mainboard.name: Faerie Vandal
mainboard.oracle_text:
Flash
Flying
Whenever you draw your second card each turn, put a +1/+1 counter on Faerie Vandal.

mainboard.name: Opt
mainboard.oracle_text:
Scry 1.
Draw a card.

mainboard.name: Brainstorm
mainboard.oracle_text: Draw three cards, then put two cards from your hand on top of your library in any order.

mainboard.name: The Reality Chip
mainboard.oracle_text:
You may look at the top card of your library any time.
As long as The Reality Chip is attached to a creature, you may play lands and cast spells from the top of your library.
Reconfigure {2}{U} ({2}{U}: Attach to target creature you control; or unattach from a creature. Reconfigure only as a sorcery. While attached, this isn't a creature.)

mainboard.name: Flux Channeler
mainboard.oracle_text: Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, proliferate. (Choose any number of permanents and/or players, then give each another counter of each kind already there.)

mainboard.name: Young Pyromancer
mainboard.oracle_text: Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, create a 1/1 red Elemental creature token.

mainboard.name: Snapcaster Mage
mainboard.oracle_text:
Flash
When Snapcaster Mage enters the battlefield, target instant or sorcery card in your graveyard gains flashback until end of turn. The flashback cost is equal to its mana cost. (You may cast that card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

mainboard.name: Fiery Islet
mainboard.oracle_text:
{T}, Pay 1 life: Add {U} or {R}.
{1}, {T}, Sacrifice Fiery Islet: Draw a card.

mainboard.name: Mizzium Tank
mainboard.oracle_text:
Trample
Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, Mizzium Tank becomes an artifact creature and gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
Crew 1 (Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 1 or more: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.)

mainboard.name: Aether Tradewinds
mainboard.oracle_text: Return target permanent you control and target permanent you don't control to their owners' hands.

mainboard.name: Gomazoa
mainboard.oracle_text:
Defender, flying
{T}: Put Gomazoa and each creature it's blocking on top of their owners' libraries, then those players shuffle.

mainboard.name: Serum Visions
mainboard.oracle_text: Draw a card. Scry 2.

mainboard.name: Winds of Rebuke
mainboard.oracle_text: Return target nonland permanent to its owner's hand. Each player mills two cards.

mainboard.name: Mischievous Chimera
mainboard.oracle_text:
Flying
Whenever you cast your first spell during each opponent's turn, Mischievous Chimera deals 1 damage to each opponent. Scry 1.

mainboard.name: Careful Study
mainboard.oracle_text: Draw two cards, then discard two cards.

sideboard.name: Carrion Feeder
sideboard.oracle_text:
Carrion Feeder can't block.
Sacrifice a creature: Put a +1/+1 counter on Carrion Feeder.

sideboard.name: Mesmeric Fiend
sideboard.oracle_text:
When Mesmeric Fiend enters the battlefield, target opponent reveals their hand and you choose a nonland card from it. Exile that card.
When Mesmeric Fiend leaves the battlefield, return the exiled card to its owner's hand.

sideboard.name: Flooded Strand
sideboard.oracle_text: {T}, Pay 1 life, Sacrifice Flooded Strand: Search your library for a Plains or Island card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

sideboard.name: Tezzeret, Betrayer of Flesh
sideboard.oracle_text:
The first activated ability of an artifact you activate each turn costs {2} less to activate.
+1: Draw two cards. Then discard two cards unless you discard an artifact card.
−2: Target artifact becomes an artifact creature. If it isn't a Vehicle, it has base power and toughness 4/4.
−6: You get an emblem with "Whenever an artifact you control becomes tapped, draw a card."

sideboard.name: Hellion Eruption
sideboard.oracle_text: Sacrifice all creatures you control, then create that many 4/4 red Hellion creature tokens.

sideboard.name: Hedron Crab
sideboard.oracle_text: Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, target player mills three cards.

sideboard.name: Master of Etherium
sideboard.oracle_text:
Master of Etherium's power and toughness are each equal to the number of artifacts you control.
Other artifact creatures you control get +1/+1.

sideboard.name: Rigging Runner
sideboard.oracle_text:
First strike
Raid — Rigging Runner enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it if you attacked this turn.

sideboard.name: Grim Initiate
sideboard.oracle_text:
First strike
When Grim Initiate dies, amass Zombies 1. (Put a +1/+1 counter on an Army you control. It's also a Zombie. If you don't control an Army, create a 0/0 black Zombie Army creature token first.)

sideboard.name: Fatestitcher
sideboard.oracle_text:
{T}: You may tap or untap another target permanent.
Unearth {U} ({U}: Return this card from your graveyard to the battlefield. It gains haste. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step or if it would leave the battlefield. Unearth only as a sorcery.)

sideboard.name: Dress Down
sideboard.oracle_text:
Flash
When Dress Down enters the battlefield, draw a card.
Creatures lose all abilities.
At the beginning of the end step, sacrifice Dress Down.

sideboard.name: Sleep of the Dead
sideboard.oracle_text:
Tap target creature. It doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.
Escape—{2}{U}, Exile three other cards from your graveyard. (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its escape cost.)

sideboard.name: Ral, Storm Conduit
sideboard.oracle_text:
Whenever you cast or copy an instant or sorcery spell, Ral, Storm Conduit deals 1 damage to target opponent or planeswalker.
+2: Scry 1.
−2: When you next cast an instant or sorcery spell this turn, copy that spell. You may choose new targets for the copy.

sideboard.name: Crimson Wisps
sideboard.oracle_text:
Target creature becomes red and gains haste until end of turn.
Draw a card.

sideboard.name: Rite of Replication
sideboard.oracle_text:
Kicker {5} (You may pay an additional {5} as you cast this spell.)
Create a token that's a copy of target creature. If this spell was kicked, create five of those tokens instead.
